My projects

JustGo Travel

JustGo Travel is a fictitious website that uses Google Maps' Places Autocomplete API and API Ninja's Bucket List.


Tools: JSX, React Js, Places Library, Figma & Web APIs

The Best Movie Trivia Game

The Best Movie Trivia is a game that consists of classic movie questions with three rounds. There are 18 movie questions in total. Each question has two option answers.


Tools: HTML5, CSS3, JS, Adobe Premiere Pro & Photoshop

My Portfolio

This portfolio website is designed and developed by Tahaylia Higgins. It showcases her software engineering projects that were thoughtfully developed with enthusiasm.


Tools: HTML5, CSS3, JS & Tailwind CSS
